TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IRequestSessionChannel implements class System.ServiceModel.Channels.IChannel, class System.ServiceModel.Channels.IRequestChannel, class System.ServiceModel.Channels.ISessionChannel`1<class System.ServiceModel.Channels.IOutputSession>, class System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject
Public Interface IRequestSessionChannel Implements IRequestChannel, ISessionChannel(Of IOutputSession)

Docs.summary: Definiuje interfejs do skojarzenia kanał żądania w sesji.

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IRequestSessionChannel> Interfejsu wskazuje, że <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IRequestChannel> implementuje <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IOutputSession> semantyki.
<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IOutputSession> Skojarzone z jego <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IReplySessionChannel> mogą zostać pobrane za pośrednictwem <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ISessionChannel%601.Session%2A> właściwości.
